price: (27) Allāh keeps firm those who believe, with the firm word,[656] in worldly life and in the Hereafter.[657] And Allāh sends astray the wrongdoers. And Allāh does what He wills.
arabic: يُثَبِّتُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ ٱلثَّابِتِ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ وَيُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَۚ وَيَفۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ
footnotes:
[656]- The testimony that there is no deity except Allāh and that Muḥammad (ﷺ) is the messenger of Allāh.
[657]- When questioned in their graves by the angels after death.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yuthabbitu al-lahu alladhīna āmanū bil-qawli al-thābiti fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati wayuḍillu al-lahu al-ẓālimīna wayafʿalu al-lahu mā yashāu
